Wayback playback to this squad. Some of the best in the biz and they do it for the love, not just the views. MAD respect. Shoutout to @FP_DanceCamp for bringing them all together and really knowing how to capture class videos. Learning, sharing, vibing. https://t.co/K6zVQtB1IS

Reading through tweets about how learning to dance for music videos is the goal of these advance classes. I'm sorry what now? The richness of this culture, you think I don't know anything about, is so much deeper than that. True art transcends ANY medium. Respect the roots.

Words are important. Studios, be clear.
Class = instruction and learning
Students pay for a learning block. Teach them in that time. Use the time after for filming, if you must.

RT @Bell_LetsTalk: Today, every view counts. Bell will donate 5¢ to mental health initiatives for every view of this video. #BellLetsTalk h…

As someone who battles chronic depression, I try to raise awareness about mental illness. At my worst, in the past, I've experienced dissociative fugue and suicidal thoughts. I got help. I get help. There is help. There is hope. Mental wellness is important. #BellLetsTalk https://t.co/tf16zRpKHn
